subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: The Bowl Championship Series chose dates for its five bowl games in an effort to avoid conflicts that could arise because of the N.F.L. lockout, with flexibility to move the title game.
snippet: The Bowl Championship Series chose dates for its five bowl games in an effort to avoid conflicts that could arise because of the N.F.L. lockout, with flexibility to move the title game.
